::: Hell Beast peeks through the bushes, and then turns to see his fighting 
force. It was composed of Gremlin, Jackle, and Transanulas. Not very 
powerful...but hopefully Megatron would do what he said he would. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Alright, so far Inferno and his team have done a farely 
well job of rouseing the Maximals. All we have to do is finish them.

::: Hell Beast charged forward, flanked by the spider, jackle, and 
dinosaur. :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron slams his fist down. Ra and Waspinator looked at him with great 
perplexedy. :::

::: Megatron ::: Wheres Scorpinox, Darkmouse, Quickstrike, Kitkat, and the 
other one?!!

::: Ra and Waspinator shrugged. :::

::: Megatron ::: Damn it! Both of you stay here, I have to help Hell Beast 
with someting rather important.

::: Ra ::: Shall I contact the Newcomers?

::: Megatron ::: Have the wasp do it. Set can hel out Hell Beast.

::: He departs in flight mode. and Waspinator contacts Set. :::

~~~~~~~~~`

::: Set awoke from a slumber he couldnt account for. He didnt know how long 
he had been out, or why. He got up and saw a flashing light on his consol. 
Answering it he saw the face of Waspinator. :::

::: Set, still groggy. ::: What do you want?

::: Waspinator ::: Megatron wants kittybot to help Hell Beast.

::: Set ::: I am in no state to assist in any battle. But, Ill see what I can 
do.

::: He turns off the messager and enters the corridor. Over the main 
announcement system he calls for Shuko. :::
